"We believed the intelligence was correct," Mr. Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview on ABC's "Good Morning America" with George Stephanopoulos , the former Democratic politico turned broadcaster. It turns out that it was not completely correct, although the inspectors did go in and determine that Saddam Hussein did, in fact, have the capability of fairly rapidly reconstituting his chemical and biological capabilities.
